00018 #include "cmodulechooserbar.h"
00019 #include "cmodulechooserbutton.h"
00020 
00021 #include <qtimer.h>
00022 
00023 CModuleChooserBar::CModuleChooserBar(ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules, CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00024     : KToolBar(parent,name) {
00025     qDebug("constructor of CModuleCHooserBar");
00026 
00027     m_moduleType = type;
00028     m_idCounter = 0;
00029     m_buttonLimit = -1; //-1 means no limit
00030 
00031   //insert buttons if useModules != 0
00032     for (useModules.first(); useModules.current(); useModules.next())        {
00033         if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit <= m_buttonList.count())
00034             break;
00035             
00036         CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(useModules.current(),m_moduleType,++m_idCounter,this);
00037         m_buttonList.append(b);
00038         insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);
00039         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00040         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00041         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00042         b->show();
00043     }
00044   if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit > m_buttonList.count() )
00045       addButton();
00046 }
00047 
00049 void CModuleChooserBar::addButton(){
00050     CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(0, m_moduleType, ++m_idCounter, this);
00051     m_buttonList.append(b); 
00052     insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);         
00053     
00054     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00055     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00056     connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00057     
00058     b->show();
00059 }
00060 
00062 void CModuleChooserBar::removeButton( const int ID ){
00063     for (m_buttonList.first(); m_buttonList.current(); m_buttonList.next()) {   
00064         if (m_buttonList.current()->getId() == ID) {    //found the right button
00065             CModuleChooserButton* b = m_buttonList.current();
00066             m_buttonList.remove(b);
00067             //ASSERT(b);
00068             b->hide();
00069           m_deleteID = ID;
00070           QTimer::singleShot( 5000, this, SLOT(deleteButton()) );
00071             break;
00072         }
00073     }       
00074     
00075     emit sigChanged();
00076 }
00077 
00079 ListCSwordModuleInfo CModuleChooserBar::getModuleList(){
00080     ListCSwordModuleInfo list;
00081     list.setAutoDelete(false);
00082     list.clear();
00083     
00084     for (m_buttonList.first(); m_buttonList.current(); m_buttonList.next()) {   
00085       CSwordModuleInfo* m = m_buttonList.current()->module();
00086       if (m)
00087         list.append( m );
00088     }
00089     return list;
00090 }
00091 
00093 void CModuleChooserBar::deleteButton(){
00094     removeItem(m_deleteID);
00095 }
00096 
00098 void CModuleChooserBar::setButtonLimit(const int limit){
00099     m_buttonLimit = limit;
00100     if (m_buttonList.count() > (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit ) {  //remove the last buttons
00101         for (m_buttonList.last(); m_buttonList.current() && (m_buttonList.count() > (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit); m_buttonList.prev() ) {
00102             CModuleChooserButton* b = m_buttonList.current();
00103             m_buttonList.remove(b);
00104             b->hide();
00105             delete b;
00106         }
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00111 void CModuleChooserBar::setModules( ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules ){
00112     setButtonLimit(0);  
00113     setButtonLimit(-1);     //these two lines clear the bar
00114     
00115     for (useModules.first(); useModules.current(); useModules.next())        {
00116         if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit <= m_buttonList.count())
00117             break;
00118             
00119         CModuleChooserButton* b = new CModuleChooserButton(useModules.current(),m_moduleType,++m_idCounter,this);
00120         m_buttonList.append(b);
00121         insertWidget(m_idCounter, b->size().width(),b);
00122         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigAddButton()), this, SLOT(addButton()) );
00123         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigRemoveButton(const int)), this, SLOT(removeButton(const int)) );
00124         connect( b, SIGNAL(sigChanged()), SIGNAL(sigChanged()) );
00125         b->show();
00126     }
00127   if (m_buttonLimit && (unsigned int)m_buttonLimit > m_buttonList.count() )
00128       addButton();
00129 }
